titles.title: To amend the Colorado Wilderness Act of 1993 to extend the interim protection of the Spanish Peaks planning area in the San Isabel National Forest, Colorado.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forests and Forest Health.

bill.summary: 3/20/1997--Introduced. Amends the Colorado Wilderness Act of 1993 to extend until Congress determines otherwise (currently expired as of August 13, 1996) the requirement that the Secretary of the Interior manage the Spanish Peaks planning area of the San Isabel National Forest in Colorado.
